author: bencomic

left.text: oh dear gopher my nemises. he was threatining to call my house last night. at 2AMz

right.text: skullie: did I ever mention how awesome you are? talking to you is fun. and that wasn't flirtatious, it was the truth.

left.text: I tried. Can you do it for me? *whimpers* he was high last night though, stoned.

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 25
